name: Shockingly Obscure Trivia! Online Trivia | Mixed  5 Questions | 5 Questions

questions.text: What entity did the Kabbalists consider the fiery Pleroma, or the Holy Spirit of God?
questions.explanation:
Shekhinah.

	The Shekhinah is another name for God's earthly domain for the Hebrews.  In other words...the mundane world that we reside upon!

questions.text: In the "La Queste del Saint Graal" where did the image of the Grail appear to the Knights of the Round Table?
questions.explanation:
Banquet hall.

	'La Queste del Saint Graal' is part of the Vulgate Cycle...a must read for any grail fanatics out there!

questions.text: What civilization produced the magnificent stone sculpture titled the 'Gumelnita Lovers' ?
questions.explanation:
Romanian.

	Not exactly of the modern Romanian variety, more ancient of course.  The Gumelnitsa civilization stretched up into the Ukraine and Moldova, north of the Black Sea.

questions.text: Who was a fish-goddess of Chaldean myth?
questions.explanation:
Onannes.

	The Chaldean dynasty of Babylon, like many of the other Middle Eastern cultures, produced a myth of the flood within which Onannes played a small part.

questions.text: How does the word 'epiphany' translate literally from the Greek?
questions.explanation:
Showing forth.

	An epiphany is a sudden intuitive realization.  For example, I just had an epiphany...I shall make an extremely obscure quiz to place online at Funtrivia!  And so I did...I hope you were able to enjoy despite the difficult questions...thank you for giving it a try.
